channel.title: Excelr on Classroom
channel.description: Recent content in Excelr on Classroom

item.title: Ps Enc
item.description: Powershell Enc PS C:\Users\mentor\Desktop\Excelr> $pt='echo "Hello $env:username"' PS C:\Users\mentor\Desktop\Excelr> $bytes=[System.Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetBytes($pt) PS C:\Users\mentor\Desktop\Excelr> $enc=[Convert]::ToBase64String($bytes) PS C:\Users\mentor\Desktop\Excelr> $enc ZQBjAGgAbwAgACIASABlAGwAbABvACAAJABlAG4AdgA6AHUAcwBlAHIAbgBhAG0AZQAiAA== PS C:\Users\mentor\Desktop\Excelr> Run the encoded code powershell.exe -enc "ZQBjAGgAbwAgACIASABlAGwAbABvACAAJABlAG4AdgA6AHUAcwBlAHIAbgBhAG0AZQAiAA=="
